ExtlRecShrCnct.name: ExtlRecShrCnct
ExtlRecShrCnct.description: Represents authentication data to make outbound calls to and inbound calls from an external system to publish events for Partner Connect.

ExternalClientApplicationId.description: ID of external client app representing your org’s connection to the external system.

ExtlRecShrCnct.accessRules: To see this object, enable Partner Connect or Partner Connect for Vendors. See Set Up Partner Connect as a Partner and Set Up Partner Connect as a Vendor in Salesforce Help.
